title: Bagpipe Sion
body:
LEGENDARY SION SKIN!

Have a Scottish Sion, instead of wielding an Axe he  wields BAGPIPES (a more dangerous weapon). I only have two ability ideas:

**E**
* Instead of a line thing he throws a cabal toss (those massive logs that are seen in Scottish games). 

**R**   
* As he activates his ult everyone hears bagpipe music, instead of a roar. Again, much more scary :p



If anyone has any more ideas on it please put in an idea. If you love it please comment/like so riot employees can notice it :)

Edit: Of cause he would wear a kilt, what else would he wear :)

replies.body: Have him not using the bagpipes as a weapon, have him hold a Gallowglass sword and have him play the pipes for his dance
I feel like the E should be with wood cutter sion but I know what you mean
Maybe, when his shield explodes, his kilt flies up a bit?
